shorts.title: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to Board of Directors
shorts.title_distilled: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A.
shorts.description: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.
shorts.content: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.

shorts.title: Expert warns of 'frostnip' as temperatures drop across NEPA
shorts.title_distilled: Expert warns of 'frostnip' as temperatures drop across NEPA.
shorts.description: (WBRE/WYOU) — Temperatures are dropping, and with it comes a warning Saturday night from medical professionals. Simply put, do not be outside for too long. A doctor 28/22 News spoke with says excessive exposure to the cold can bring about numbness and redness in hands, feet, and the face, which sounds innocent, but are actually [...]
shorts.content: (WBRE/WYOU) — Temperatures are dropping, and with it comes a warning Saturday night from medical professionals. Simply put, do not be outside for too long. shorts.title: PennDOT crews wait for coming snowfall
shorts.title_distilled: PennDOT crews wait for coming snowfall.
shorts.description: DUNMORE, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — While many people are staying home ahead of Sunday's storm, Pennsylvania Department of Transportation (PennDOT) crews have been out preparing for the snow to fall. After careful monitoring, material checks, and routine maintenance, crews said they are ready to take on this storm as conditions worsen. One PennDOT employee said [...]
shorts.content: DUNMORE, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — While many people are staying home ahead of Sunday's storm, Pennsylvania Department of Transportation (PennDOT) crews have been out preparing for the snow to fall.
